long_description: Combining rock shoe upper construction with a trail-worthy sole, the Scarpa Mojito Shoes are perfect for around-town walking, short adventures on trails and international travel. Suede leather uppers mold to your feet over time for a super comfortable fit. Scarpa-specific Vibram(R) Spyder soles offer excellent durability and grip. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide plush cushion. Small rubber toecaps protect the suede leather against abrasion. Lacing on the Scarpa Mojito Shoes goes all the way to the toes for an accurate fit. Closeout.
short_description: Combining rock shoe upper construction with a trail-worthy sole, the Scarpa Mojito Shoes are perfect for around-town walking, short adventures on trails and international travel.
